iterations.failure_reason: Rule hit but no new signatures
improvement_suggestions: Instead of relying on a fixed skip offset, the rule should be adjusted to dynamically determine the correct offset based on the surrounding instruction sequence. A more robust approach would involve identifying a unique sequence of instructions preceding the bypassed instruction and using that sequence to calculate the skip offset. Alternatively, the bypass can be removed and a new signature created that captures the functionality of the bypassed code.
